metadata.title: CVE-2013-4232 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the t2p_readwrite_pdf_image function intools/tiff2pdf.c in libtiff 4.0.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted TIFFimage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-5ubuntu1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-5ubuntu1
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-5ubuntu1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-5ubuntu1').
